long_description: The Benchmade 580S Barrage knife introduces an improved spring-assist opening and locking mechanism for speed and strength in 1 complete package. AXIS(R) spring-assist opening and locking mechanism has been updated to be stronger than its predecessors; provides a safety lock in both opened and closed positions. Ambidextrous thumb-stud design allows you to easily open and close the knife with either hand. Drop-point, stainless-steel blade measures 3.6 in. and has a blade hardness of 58-61HRC; blade is 0.12 in. thick. Resin handle is impervious to moisture and provides a strong, comfortable frame that is easy to handle. Benchmade 580S Barrage knife features a reversible pocket clip that makes storage and transport easy-just clip it on your pocket or belt and go!
